derivation: or תְּמֹל; probably for H865 (אֶתְמוֹל); sometimes with  H8032 (שִׁלְשׁוֹם)
strongs_def: properly, ago, i.e. a (short or long) time since; especially yesterday, or  day before yesterday
kjv_def: [phrase] before (-time), [phrase] these (three) days, [phrase] heretofore, [phrase] time past, yesterday.
